subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Notre Dame suspended tailback Cierre Wood, who had a team-high 1,102 yards rushing last year, and defensive end Justin Utupo for two games for violating unspecified rules.
snippet: Notre Dame suspended tailback Cierre Wood, who had a team-high 1,102 yards rushing last year, and defensive end Justin Utupo for two games for violating unspecified rules.
